title: Golf and relax
review: Room is ok, but kitchen has poor equipment.  No toaster, no kettle, no coffee maker only dated espresso maker.  There is Nothing to clean kitchen, you need to buy it. They dont do dishies so you have to buy all you need for that.   But It was nice quiet place.    The most dissapointed thing was Food in the clubhouse.  After playing 5 hours you need something decence to eat.  Food was so tiny and bad taste that it almost made me crying.

title: luxury apartments at reasonable prices
review: Great accomodation, pools, restaurants, grounds, staff and position. Need a hire car to explore and get provisions. Adjacent to 18 hole golf course. Interesting, international clientele. Lovely, well cared for gardens, Great for families.

title: No service
review: It’s dinnertime, no other customers, three camareros, but no service to clients. Unbelievable poor  service. Not friendly at all. This is suppose to be hotels restaurant and unluckily this is the only one in this area.  Maybe they can then choose, who to service.

title: Recent Coastal Golf Travel / BarV GS visit to El Plantio Golf Course
review: I would just like to thank David ( the Course Manager ) & his staff for all the effort they made to getting our group off on time, with having to wait on buggies returning they worked tirelessly to avoid a delay, secondly the group all commented upon the layout of the course and it excellent condition it was in a testament to the staffs hard work, we will look forward to this groups next visit...with hopefully a lot more to follow :-)

title: Disappointing
review: This was our second visit and sadly we were very disappointed. Unfortunately the place seems to have deteriorated since our last visit. Last year we advised that I am gluten free and was assured that there were many options, we tried it once and were offered a baked roll still in the wrapper and a chocolate cake, not really equivalent to everyone else’s options! It could do we a very good clean in the rooms and the sun beds were very dirty. We had a problem with a down pipe which we reported three times, no one attended the room to investigate, it was making such a loud noise after the rain that we had three nights of little sleep, when we raised this on departure we were told that booking.com would deal with it, when we showed the receptionist a picture of the dust in the room she offered us a refund of one nights stay immediately!  Very disappointed and will not be returning. …

title: Good value option for a few days
review: Hotel was out of town but there is a bar and a few mini bar options in the fridge for arrival. I would suggest booking a high floor as our room was on the ground without much sun and smelt damp.  Pool area was clean and spacious and good food options in the bar. Order food with plenty of time as we did get forgotten a couple of times and service slow but worth the wait as food is good. Good self catering options although a few cheap things could do with replacing as looked grotty and could be done for less than £5

title: What a Gem!
review: After looking for weeks for a hotel and ideal destination and price we stumbled across this beauty!   Not far from the town however we are so glad we got a hire car! GoldCar from the airport pre booked absolute perfection!   15 minute drive from the airport, plenty of parking we managed to get the spot outside our apartment most nights! (€4 per day for the underground parking) otherwise free! Hotel staff very good English very pleasant and helpful!   There is no kettle in the room so if you like a cup of tea bring a travel one or like us boil of the hob!   Both pools are large, very clean and well kept. Both pools have sectioned off areas for small children. Plentiful sun loungers at this time of the year!   Apartment was beautifully spacious, little dark in the rooms however…

title: One night stop
review: Absolutely blown away by this place, so clean, comfortable, spacious and modern apartments, every where was spotless and staff were so helpful. We were a group of 18 and they made sure one apartment was ready for us to use on our arrival.The service at the restaurant was excellent and the food was very good and reasonable. The children loved the pool. Would definitely stay here again

title: Great appartments
review: Huge apartments, very comfortable and clean, 2 lovely pools and great view over the golf course. 10 minutes from Airport and 20 minutes from Alicante. No aeroplane noise despite proximity to the airport, it was in a very peaceful location.

title: Bad service -bad hotel rules- badly cleaned
review: I was not happy with my stay with my family there, the room was cleaned poorly, nothing was cleaned really, just put a new blanked on the bad, the service at the restaurant on the hotel was really bad and took a lot of time just to order a coke. The rules at the swimmingpool was stupid and confusing, sometimes the staff just took the towels off the sunbed if you went away for a bit and put it in a box behind the desk, really confusing and bad rule, it did not happen everytime or to everybody, just sometimes to somebody, kind of confusing?

title: Relaxation holiday.
review: What a fantastic hotel.  The accommodation itself is beautiful, clean, modern and very roomy.  Staff are so friendly and try so hard to make your stay as pleasant as possible.   The food at this hotel is amazing and to a very high quality, the sheff obviously knows what he’s doing and has a very good team around him. I was blown away allot of the night we were sereved dinner.  I would love to come back with the family instead of just my partner and play golf!  You must hire a car if staying in this resort, we paid 15 Euro’s for an under storey car park which kept the car cool. Worth it for the week. The hotel is close to the airport but a drive to anything else nearby. You would need a car for a trip to a grocery shop as the nearest is in Alicante. No shop at the hotel for…

title: Hidden gem
review: Excellent Hard to fault anything close to airport and Alicante. Rooms very spacious,2 pools really nice all staff brilliant. Golf course nearby . You do need a car  if you want to get about. Taxi to Alicante 8mins 15 euro

title: Lovely place but no amenities
review: Beautiful resort! It is a bit of a ride in a taxi to Alicante so be prepared for around €20 each way.  Resort is nice and breakfast is well worth money.  Appartment was nice but were given no dishwashing tablets, coffee, tea, beach towels,soap etc... which is a bit annoying.   Apparently could also do with a paint and lots of marks on walls and beds.  Altogether a nice place and very helpful staff. Would come back!

title: Mixed
review: The apartment was clean and had enough space,issue is that the on suite bathroom the door did not fully close with the toilet right behind it! Room 604 Parking under cover cost 4euro and was. Tight getting the car in The grounds were lovely and the pool are looked nice. Breakfast was included in the price and was alright although the    cooked food was not very warm. For me the biggest issue was the staff,went to the bar and ignored , asked if we could take the drinks back to the room and had to have plastic glasses and the waiter forgot the order,again went to bar and he had the order in his pocket!  Good location for airport as the guide says 10 minutes

title: Great overnight stay!!
review: We picked this resort as it was close to the airport for an overnight stay and early flight home. We ended up at the golf course initially but were directed further down the road to the resort. We were allocated room 815 which was exactly what we wished for, sunny balcony, private and a nice view. We were amazed at the size of the apartment (two bed!!) all mod cons and really enjoyed our stay. We went for a meal at the restaurant and it was ok, but the menu was not to our liking, but it was a nice atmosphere around the pool and the service was fine. Minor improvements could be made but overall a really good resort, near to the airport, and very quiet apart from the occasional swish of a golf club!!

title: Lovely place
review: Stayed here with my daughter for a three day mini break. Was lovely and the pools were good and great to have the childrens pool.  Restaurant food was lovely...burger especially! Should do child portions though!  Staff in restaurant and bar were nice and great with kids! Rooms clean and well equipped.   Will return

title: Such a lovely park, great swimmingpools
review: This hotel is situated in great nature. It is a setting where you can play golf, but also the rest of the park is great with beautiful flowers. They offer spacious appartments with a terrace. They all are but seconds away from a pool. Breakfast here is great and Staff is kind. Parking is free and easy near your appartment. It is a short drive to Alicante.

title: Upgraded
review: Hi i stayed in this resort last night. On arrival we were allocated a ground floor apartment. There was a musty smell coming from dishwasher.My friend discovered a dirty frying pan in it. We returned to reception with said frying pan abd Ana staff member was horrified...She upgraded us to a penthouse apartment with pool views room number 522. Then a fruit basket and bottle of wine arrived. Very happy with service and wilk stay again.

title: Scenic golf
review: First time here and we will be back! Well laid out and maintained course with good signage to help you get around. Some good challenging holes made for an enjoyable visit. Friendly staff at reception and the bar made us feel at home.

title: Amazing
review: We have discovered El Plantio Golg Resort Hotel in   2013 and after we started in 2015 to went each summer till now   And again we will go in August also this year . Just to certify that we really appreciate this hôtel appartement that it become ouf second house! The team is smiling, welcoming, helpful. In five years we have only a problem last year because pool had a leak and needed to be fixed . The team offered to us breakfast for the rest of the stay . We live Alicante and especially this hotel

title: Outstanding service
review: Very friendly and helpful staff, especially Francesca at reception. Clean, spacious and fabulous breakfast. A little hard to find as Google sends you the wrong way but keep going and its worth it! Great stay!

title: Golf
review: Was here with a group of friends. Nice hotel but the food was Ok. Close to the golf course still 800 metres to the club house. Friendly staff and good service. Apartments and gardens is nice and cleane.

title: Fantastic place
review: We came on a Family holiday and we loved the place. Very spacious, huge rooms. Nice and decently clean. The Postiget beach is just a 10 minute drive (5 km) and the San Juan beach is a 20 minute drive. The apartment has all the utilities needed and a shopping centre (puerta de Alicante) is just 5 minutes away from the resort where you can find Carrefour and Mercadona to buy your groceries. The swimming pools are also great. Loved it and we'll most definitely come back.

title: Nice apartment hotel complex
review: The pros: - modern building complex, well kept - really spacious apartments (minimum is 2 bedrooms, full kitchen, living room, terrace) - surrounded by tropical gardens and a golf course - nice staff - two outside pools - close to the airport and the cities of Alicante and Elche  The cons: - forget about your preferences; hotel policy is obviously not taking anything in consideration (what we planned is what you get; if you ask, be prepared for the standard  reply that "the hotel is fully booked") - the soundproofing is totally absent: you will hear everything your neigbors are doing: talking, walking, sneezing, TV, you name it and you will "enjoy" it as well - the pools aren't heated, very few chairs  - the rooms are superficially cleaned (dust under the beds, crums left on the…

title: Nice hotel disgusting food
review: We stayed here one night as it’s close to the airport. The hotel and rooms are nice enough but the food here is shocking, which is a problem when you’re in the middle of nowhere. The burger was inedible. Like a hockey puck with stale crumbly bread buns and dry as the vegetation in southern Spain. Potatoes were sent back as they were salty enough to kill a slug and the pasta was over cooked enough to eat with no teeth - or mouth. The risotto was over seasoned and covered in foam. Utter rubbish, even the waiter looked embarrassed. Shame as it’s a nice place and the staff are friendly. If you’re gonna stay here bring your own food or take a taxi into Alicante. It’s that bad.

title: Spacious apartments, large pool, near airport
review: For those with a car, this is a great and convenient place for the airport and the city centre. We were upgraded to a 3 bed apartment. Lovely large pool but as visited in Feb couldn't use it.   I recommend that the management provides a cleaning kit per apartment as this is now standard in all apartments. Great that cleaning service is provided daily.  Very helpful and polite staff. I recommend it!

title: First class accommodation
review: Four of us stayed here for the first time & although we played the resort golf course, we based ourselves at the resort & played other courses in the surrounding area. We were quite surprised at the high standard of the accommodation. Our unit consisted of two bedrooms, one ensuite, lounge, dining room, well equipped kitchen & a laundry room. There are two swimming pools, a bar & restaurant & secure parking adjacent to the apartments. The resort is a 15 minute taxi ride from Alicante airport. The course clubhouse is about a 10 minute walk from the apartment. The food in the bar & restaurant is high quality & the service is efficient but pleasant & friendly. We are already planning a return trip with friends.

title: Golf is decent, accommodation nice but food is appalling
review: Ok so let’s start with the positives: the golf course is nice, and the accommodation is large and clean. Unfortunately it is massively let down by the food service. Breakfast is mediocre, and the breakfast staff is unhelpful. Crazily the actual apartment complex restaurant is closed during lunchtime and one cannot even get a drink. The dinner service is also distinctly underwhelming. Food is lacklustre and tasteless and altogether poor.   This is a real shame because the actual resort would have a lot going for it if it could step up the service. If you are prepared to travel into Alicante for food, it’s a great place to be, but unfortunately it’s a 20 minute drive to the nearest eatery, and it precludes having a drink with food.   Sadly this can’t really compete with the other…

title: Very Nice Clean and trustworthy
review: The apartment was great had everything we needed everything worked perfectly fine and all appliances and equipment was very clean  The restaurant was reasonably price and it was good food  We had a great view We took taxis into Alicante and worth the travel.  Would recommend this hotel

title: Lovely resort!
review: We stayed here at the end of January/beginning of February. The resort is a 10-15 minute taxi journey from the airport. I would say probably about 30 minutes away from the centre. The apartment was really spacious. It consisted of 3 double/twin rooms. One being an en suite. There’s kitchen facilities, cooker, oven etc. There’s also laundry room. The views from the balcony was nice. I would stay here again only if we end up playing golf as I prefer to stay in the city centre. We didn’t get the opportunity to do so this time.   Perfect location for golfers.

title: Great value and location for touring the area
review: We booked a 5 night short January break and chose El Plantio as our base. Great apartment , spacious and clean.  Staff very helpful and accommodating.Easy parking near our room and a great location if you have your own car, as only 10 mins from airport and also the downtown  Alicante.(A really lovely city) Neither my wife of I are 'Golfers' but the course looked spectacular and well kept. On-site restaurant was undergoing  refurbishment, so couldn't comment on that as we self catered from nearby supermarkets 95 mins by car) for breakfast and some evenings when not eating out. Electrical equipment in room for self catering was good , but would benefit from a complimentary 'welcome pack' of dishwasher tablets, cloths and maybe salt, pepper and olive oil ! Not sure if  in busy…

title: Not a savory experience with this hotel, unfortunately
review: Apartment seemed passably clean upon check in, although crumbs on kitchen counter and sticky coffee table were off putting. Nowhere is property listed as self catering, so when we heard it had a full kitchen, we expected at least the basics. There was a dirty cutting board (not stained, literally with old food on it) and an old immersion blender, but no kettle, coffee maker, wine opener, nor soap/sponge/towels- anything- to wash up with. Still, we only had a one night stay, and the beds seemed fresh (the only thing that I feel like was actually cleaned) so we brushed it off. The room was chilly (off season, heater took some time to warm space), so decided to take hot shower to warm up. Alas, no hot water, and the discovery of dirty hand towels, greasy mirror, makeup on floor,…

title: Great Course medium difficulty
review: Very good inland course 15 minutes from Santa Pola Great restaurant in a nice setting my only negative is don't waste your money on the driving range very poor quality range balls Ralelatively flat can easily do with a Trolley worth a visit if you are on holiday on the coast only 5 minutes from Alicante airport easy to find

title: Great place except
review: We have stayed many times and like this resort.   However, the WiFi internet is always terrible.   Tv reception is also always terrible.  The hotel itself is well presented and well maintained. Come on plantio get this technology fixed!

title: Not the best place with a group of friends
review: Our room's was perfect but the city is far away. When we was coming to this apartment we came with 2 taxi, but when we wanna go to another place the receptionist call us 3 taxi and when she call them she tell them that we are going to the air port when we said that we need the 2 taxi and we are going to the city center. we would not say if we were talking in another language but spoken with them in Spanish and they did not understand what we wanted. so we are disappointed.

title: Outstanding facility; Really Hard to Find
review: El Plantio Golf Resort is an outstanding facility and excellent value even for one who doesn't play golf.  The rooms, suites really, were spacious and clean, the view of the pool and grounds was really nice, and the breakfast also was very good value.  Considering Europe prices, this was a really good deal.      The one downside is that it was REALLY difficult to find and doubly so after dark when our flight arrived.  Be sure you have extremely precise directions that take into account the various roundabouts and road number changes.  Even with a GPS in the car, it took us to the wrong place (to a small road next to one end of the golf course, far out of sight of the hotel facility itself), and the signage on the roads was inadequate.  I'm not sure we ever would have found it if…

title: Lovely rooms disappointing food
review: On arrival our 3 bed apartment for just the two of us was impressive. The rooms are large, modern and have a beautiful balcony which for the price we paid was brilliant. The hotel was quite quiet, always lots of sun-loungers available and the staff are generally helpful. There are two large pools, a kids play area and access to the golf course for those wanting to play. Now the not so goods, the food became a bit of a dreaded part of the day for us. Neither of us are fussy eaters but fried octopus, cured tuna soup and raw sardine salad were a few of the meals on offer with the half board package. Breakfast was nice but always cold - however with growling bellies after not eating much dinner we overlooked what would normally be unacceptable. The place is a little isolated and a…

title: Initial problems but resolved professionally by manager
review: Beautiful location and nice open course (attached is a view from our balcony). We stayed as a family and the pool facilities were excellent.   We had our boiler breakdown (these things happen) during the day which meant no hot water and although the initial response from the staff was inadequate with a general lack of communication  (it was past 9pm before we could bathe the kids). The saving grace was manager mr Munoz’s response. He dealt with it professionally; showing empathy and accurately analysing how the issue could have been handled and provisions for the future.   Overall we would come again and found having a car was invaluable for visiting the surrounding areas.

title: Lovely but a few problems
review: Absolutely beautiful hotel, we stayed in a 3 bedroom apartment for 2 of us but it was fantastic and cleaned without fail daily.  We found the restaurant pricey at €20 per person for breakfast so we preferred to eat out a lot and went to Alicante city daily which was beautiful and had a lot of restaurants catering for all taste buds.  It’s definitely a relaxing holiday unless you enjoy the golf side of things and staff aren’t the friendliest unfortunately however we would definitely return.

title: Just 1 night but will return
review: This resort offers very spacious 3 bedroom apartments, with 2 clean bathrooms, a well equipped kitchen and large lounge/ dinning room area. Set into the extensive ground of the golf course, it is quite. It’s close to Alicante airport and makes a peaceful respite before the hectic bustle of the airport.  The apartment comes with a washer and dryer.  The restaurant offers a good selection of food on the lunch and dinner menus. We enjoyed Excellent salads, pizza and fries from the lunch menu all at very reasonable prices.  The restaurant overlooks the very large swimming pool and its staff are friendly and helpful.

title: Disappointing
review: Firstly, the pool and the pool area is brilliant. The receptionists and the staff are friendly  However  The food choice.. never really known anything like it. NOTHING at all for vegetarians. NOTHING. Then the choice of food is most odd. As you can see one night we had the choice between fish or duck. Quite unique options and not to everyone's taste. The food itself wasnt that bad, but not great either. On the last night I just went without.   The air con in our room did nothing but blow warm air. Night's were very sticky. The rooms are nice and dark though with the shutters. There were weird stains on the sofa that I wouldn't fancy knowing what they were.   One of the waiters called Jesus was ironically our saviour and tried to look after us, but sadly you can't polish a turd.

title: It's OK.
review: Myself and my husband stayed here for a period in the August / September time.  There are some good and bad points about this place. I'll start with some bad...  I'm not sure that the staff know whether it's a hotel or apartments, the staff are some of the rudest people I've met and can be very unhelpful.  We asked for an extra pillow and we're told this was not possible...the hotel is virtually empty, so we went and bought some, as we found it quite hard to sleep with what was provided. The beds are quite hard and mattress protectors aren't used, there were some stains on the mattress which, I tried to forget whilst sleeping in the bed! A fire alarm had started going off during one of the nights, we had contacted reception and was told to take a walk up there to explain...OK…

title: Fantastic Resort
review: My partner booked this hotel for four nights at the end of August. I wasn’t sure what to expect but the self serviced apartments are fantastic. They are so clean and spacious and the resort is only 4 miles from the airport and only a short drive from Alicante City. The swimming pools were so clean and really well maintained. There were always sun loungers available and the resort staff were absolutely brilliant. I will definitely be staying at El Plantio again.

title: Nice apartment resort to stay
review: Very nice resort with fully equipped rooms. Beatiful resort area,looks like a very nice tropical park with fancy trees and shrubs. Very well manicured. Rooms are comfortable and nicely designed. Reasonable price at least in September when we stayed there for 4 days.would love to return

title: WONDERFUL HOTEL
review: What a great hotel close to airports shirt car ride to all amenities including beach shops and attractions staff behind bar and at reception were absolutely amazing so friendly so helpful and always greeted with a smile such wonderful views we ventured up the nearby mountainside of an evening to watch the sunset which was spectacular picturesque hotel with great facilities and clean rooms a must for all travellers to this area

title: Our second visit - unfortunately not quite as good as the first, but still good
review: We've just returned from a second visit to El Plantio.  Whilst this is still a very nice place to stay, this holiday wasn't quite as enjoyable second time round  Firstly - whilst we were on the upper floor of our two story apartments, we believe there was a sun terrace on the roof above our apartment.  This meant that every night and into the early hours, we were disturbed by the sound of furniture being dragged across the tiled floor.  We appreciate that the nature of tiled apartment means neighbouring noise cannot be helped, but it gets a bit tiresome when you are woken every night by the same noise.  The apartments equipment is somewhat limited to - you can borrow Kettles and toasters from reception, but tea towels, oven gloves and oven trays are non existant.  You can buy…

title: Very nice and spacious place to relax
review: Apartments are very big and you can feel like at home not like in the hotel. Restaurant, golf course ,mini golf , kids playground are available. We had direct access to the lovely swimming pool from our terrace. Kids mini golf does require some improvement as it is nothing special. I would give a 5 stars if only golf course would be available for hotel guest. Unfortunately you have to pay and for me who never played before i couldn’t see a reason to pay for an hour or two to try the game unless you are a golf player who intend to play all 18 courses. Would definitely recommend El Plantio golf resort and will be back there on my next trip to Alicante. It takes around 10 min by car to the Alicante city center.

title: Great apartments, but very isolated
review: Lovely large modern apartments on a very green area around alicante. We stayed for 4 nights, we had previously had a week in a villa in Javea and had a taxi to this resort. I thought that there would be a restaurant or a shop that was walkable - even if it was a mile or so away. Trust me you definitely need a car for this resort. We managed with one taxi trip into alicante and stocked up on food and drinks, like others have stated the taxi that takes you to alicante already had 8 euros on the meter and cost 20 in, the return journey was only 13 which is more manageable. The restaurant on site is reasonably priced but limited in choice, after 7pm it turns into a La carte which is very expensive for small portions. Drinks are quite reasonable.  Overall a good few days in the sun…

title: So beautiful & immaculate
review: This is such an amazing resort. Staff are extremely kind, helpful and extremely good with children. Rooms were always left immaculate and cleaned everyday. Two big pools with plenty of loungers. Only a few slight fault - evening entertainment/back round music is a major missing issue. I understand that it is a relaxing resort but due to the distance from everything it would’ve added to the atmosphere. Otherwise an amazing resort in which I’ve been twice.

title: Poor service
review: Girl working in the reception poorly coordinated everything for us. Did not tell anything about the city and how to get there when we asked, then on the leaving day we booked taxi and she booked in on the other address that we told her, for the wrong address we had to pay more for the taxi.

title: Poor Welcome followed by Worst Service
review: We booked this resort after reading the excellent reviews on trip adviser. We received no information on arrival, Rooms not cleaned, followed by poor restaurant service. I have stayed at many Spanish hotels, and I rate this the Worst😟

title: Stop over after a late night arrival
review: My family and I (2 young boys) stayed here for 1 night after a late arrival at ALC airport. There was plenty of room in our immaculate 2 bed apartment and it was really close to one of the pools. Breakfast was buffet style and there was plenty of choice for kids and adults. Eating next to the pool meant our boys were itching to get in though! We would definitely go back as all staff were friendly and efficient.

title: Great place to relax with the family!
review: A perfect location- short distance from the airport and a five minute drive from the main town. Spacious and well equipped apartments. Two large swimming pools and a play area for the children.  We would definitely recommend this resort to other families.  We have two young children and they were entertained all day in the  pool area with other children.  We will be visiting this resort again soon!

title: Nice hotel, calm and kids-friendly
review: We booked this hotel as we wanted an apart-hotel close to a golf.  We liked it very much. It is close to Alicante and the swimming pool is great!  The only thing we missed is a decent coffee machine and an electrical cattle

title: Green hotel, big apartments with big pools (in remote area)
review: This hotel is a green oasis in a remote area next to the airport. It's about 10 minutes from the airport. The gardens are very green and there are about 5-7 complexes with apartments. We had a family apartment which was clean and spacious and a big terrace with pool view. The hotel has a golf course so if you are golfer you will be on the court with your hotel.  If you are not a golfer it's a good place to extend your holiday for some days while next to the airport or as a stopover (it's next to the highway to the south of Spain). I think staying here for a week or more might be a little boring because there is not a lot to do in area. Alicante is about 15 minutes drive and there is a big shopping mall within 10 minutes drive.  The hotel has 3 big swimming pools with sun beds.…

title: Great!
review: Well priced, modern, we'll equipped apartments. A choice of swimming pools and secure underground parking offered at a small cost ($4).   It is slightly isolated so a car is a must.   Very helpful reception staff.

title: A nice stay in june - off season
review: We had booked an apartment 134 m2, very nice. The only negative was that they only have a table for two at the terrasse, we were 4 travelling together. We asked for more chairs, but they could not help. Good helpful staff, nice service. A nice area with an excellent pool, it has to be the biggest pool I ever seen at a hotel. Almost 50 metres long. Good for families with kids. When you live here you need a car, then you are more mobile. We loved it, we could also book it again.

title: Disgusting lunch
review: Disgusting lunch menu, and the problem is there is no other place to eat out here.  White trash fast food lunch. I’m so sick of all these Spanish restaurants selling only nasty American fast food. And coming up with things like “it’s what they want” NO!!! It’s because almost every central restaurant is fast food. Probably to squeeze most money out of tourists.

title: Nice apartment hotel
review: This is a nice quite apartment hotel close to the airport. The apartment was clean and very comfortable. The outdoor area is nice and the pool was good. There is not a lot to do other then golf bud that is the main purpose of the hotel and then it works lovely.

title: Nice break just outside Alicante not only for golfers
review: A little oasis of green at 5min from the Airport. Well located for visiting Alicante or Elche. Two beautiful swimming pools surrounded by nice garden. Fully equipped apartments/rooms. Perfect for a break and visit to Alicante.

title: Great hotel
review: Very nice hotel and golf course. The rooms are very spacious and fine. We stayed there and played golf for one week and the food was included. Very good food and good service. The breakfast is very good. I have been to this hotel three times and I am always very happy when I leave. If you like to go downtown to have dinner or to a bar you are only 10 minutes with a taxi.The rooms are very clean and the beds are very good. The resort is near the airport which is great. The garden is nice and clean, enough of chairs and benches for everyone to sunbathe.

title: Great stay
review: Booked as part of a flight and hotel package. Close to the airport, though fairly remote so a car will be recommended. The apartment - 3 bed - was spacious. The bedroom configuration was not as advertised however, we had two rooms with twins and one room with a double rather than one king, one queen and four single beds. The kitchen could be better well equipped with more pots and pans; we opted for self catering. There is an oven and microwave. No toaster nor kettle, we did ask for a kettle and this was brought. An ironing board but no iron! Our apartment had a sun terrace and we were happily not facing the pool directly which does attract noise. There is a TV thought endless channel hoping required to find the English speaking channel. It would be useful to have a channel list…

title: Definitely recommend
review: My friends and I stayed at the resort for two nights . We’ve got upgraded for 3 bed apartment which was very spacious ,clean with well equipped kitchen . Pool area was nice , breakfast good enough . People who work there are really nice and reception is very helpful. We had a chance to change our stay for late check out for a really good price of €35 only . You just can’t say anything bad about this place. Resort is very close from the airport and to get to town . I would recommend to have your own car if possible cause to get a cab every time you want to go out will cost you quite a bit of money.

title: Excellent
review: Just arrived home from a one week stay at El Plantio.   Could not fault the place at all, it was immaculate, rooms cleaned every day.  We stayed in a two bedroomed apartment which was very spacious.  Like other reviews, you definitely need a car as there is nowhere to walk to, and also the kitchen has all the appliances you need to self cater although there is no kettle - did not bother us we just used a pan to heat water for tea and coffee.  There is a bar and restaurant which was reasonably priced and the food good.   Staff were very friendly and helpful.  All in all a really nice place to stay if you don't mind driving everywhere.

title: Great for a couple of days
review: Stayed overnight as we decided to extend our stay in Alicante by a day. The rooms were big and good value for when we went. There’s a nice pool area and the restaurant and bar is  very decent too. We didn’t play golf, but I’m sure it’s very nice. Only issue is that it is quite remote so there is not much else to do. Very good for what we wanted, but I would think you wouldn’t want to stay much longer than a couple of nights. We have young kids and I’m sure they would have gotten bored if we’d stayed longer.

title: Apartment size is the only good thing about this hotel!
review: Apartments are spacious which is the major selling point here. However the rooms need a good, proper clean. We stayed in 401 on the ground floor. Just a small table and two chairs on balcony/ patio area, nothing to sunbathe. Didn’t spend much time on there as flys are everywhere due to the over grown bushes/ plants. Not enough utensils in the kitchen. slow drainage in shower and sinks. Sofa looks like it needs a good clean. Hated sitting it on it! People have obviously been sat on there after being on the beach/ pool and suncreams have stained it.  Quiet location however the rooms are paper thin so you can hear everything!!!!!!! Our last night we had a group of girls next door and we didn’t sleep at all.  No welcome pack/ info books in the rooms which is a shame. Nothing to show…

title: Fabulous
review: Stayed a couple of nights there,fabulous roomy apartment,set in lovely gardens,with two great swimming pools,including children's ends in each pool.Nice breakfast,small bar,and the staff,in particular Ana on Reception could not have been more helpful.

title: Good for golf vacation
review: Really good place to stay at when golfing. Great golf course and nice staff. The apartment was nice with a great view over the golf course. The staff was very nice but the food during lunch and dinner could be so much better! El Plantio is very close to the airport and Alicante, max 5. min drive in a taxi.

title: Golf vacation par excellent
review: Really good place to golf and the hotel is clean and tidy. The apartment was spacious but it lacked some kitchen equippments and the bed er slept in was á little worn out. But over all friendly staff. The golf course is moderatly difficult with a few memorably holes where nr 13, 14 and 17 comes to mind.

title: Average
review: The hotel grounds are pretty and the rooms are nice in appearance but there are several lacking factors that lower the grade of this hotel.  The lack of comfort of the sofa, the poor choice and quality of TV channels and the terrible WiFi let the plantio down.  I would suggest only staying if the rate was comparable to budget hotels but certainly not at the regular rates.

title: Good for a game of golf and near to Alicante Airport
review: Only stayed the one night as I was dropping someone off at Alicante Airport the following morning and we decided to have a game of golf the day before. The room was massive with 3 bedrooms, a large lounge and a decent sized Kitchen. We had an evening meal in the restaurant which was OK but somewhat expensive. The wi-fi was good and I paid a small fee to extend my stay until early afternoon. The only negative thing I can think of is that you need a car to get around. No bars or restaurants in the area. The resort is near Alicante Airport and therefore ideal if you have an early flight in the morning

title: Good place to stop over before or after a flight
review: Spacious apartments on a golf course, near to the airport.  Outside sitting area and excellent breakfast. Washing machine and dryer so that you can do your washing before you leave for home.  Need more utensils and a kettle if you want to self cater. We always stay here as it is convenient and so relaxing

title: Good resort at reasonable price
review: Have been twice in the last few years. Facilities and apartment were excellent, marred only by a group of British young people in the next apartment partying until early morning. Security had to be called to shut them up but we got a huge basket of fruit from the management for the inconvenience. Apart from that it was very enjoyable

title: Quiet Relaxing week
review: This is a superb place if you want a quiet relaxing short stay away from it all. It was perfect. Although there was only two of us we had the luxury of a three bed appapartment which was spotless and fully equipped (could have done with a sharp knife for chopping, but maybe this was health and safety issue). The resort itself is in beautiful grounds away from the hustle and bustle of Alicante but close enough to visit in a car (which we found a necessity) Two lovely pools

title: Just short
review: Came on what could only.be described as a good price holiday for family.  Wifi offered was not really available stayed in room 721 and wifi was poor.  Shower head that did its own thing, toilet door that would not lock, bar not open during day (might be time of year) small things I know but if you want to be high end they need sorting.  Having said that the room was very large good quality and cleaning spot on.  Terrible neighbour's 712 you know who you are noisy horrible people. But that is not the hotel's fault.  It really is nice place. Needs a shop. Is quite close to Alicante Centre but you need a car.  It is a nice place just silly little things to make it spot on

title: Lovely apartments
review: Spacious 2 bed apartments close to the airport (15 Euro for airport taxi) About a 10 minute walk to the golf course - no shuttle Course was rather poor- both greens and fairways Club house nice with lovely food  Disappointed with the ‘restaurant’ at the apartment, we booked as half board. The facility was basic, limited seating and cold. The menu was very limited for a 7 day stay

title: Bargain
review: Came for a cheap 5 day golf get away with 5 friends and were pleasantly surprised the apartments are spot on the golf course is lovely and not to expensive 10 minutes from the airport and 10 minutes from the town centre will definitely be returning

title: Great Location. Excellent Apartment. Lovely Short Break
review: Just outside Alicante a large golf complex with excellent apartments. Very spacious 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Beds great and cleaned every day. Lovely large balconies and we over looked the golf course. Great view in mornings. On site restaurant but we did not use this. Lunch at the golf club down the road was lovely.You Do need a car to get about from here. Alicante is 10 mins drive away.The minor issues were no information or maps available on the complex and please put some Mugs in the kitchens for morning tea!! A dish cloth and tea towel would also be useful.

title: Superb
review: Very well located hotel, approximate to airport and very close to Alicante city. Superb apartments worthy of many five star hotels.  Golf, swimming, walking and great shopping in nearby Alicante. Rooms were large and comfortable I could not fault El Plantio.

title: Short break
review: Just returned from relaxing get away for a few days.  Solo trip so chose this resort and it certainly ticked the box for safety. But a little too safe if that is possible. It is completely remote.  However nice time had wandering the walking paths in the hillside opposite and round the golf course. Had lunch in the club house was lovely. The apartment I was in 116 was close to reception as I requested. Lovely apartment.  2 bedrooms 1 ensuite, bathroom with full size bath. Kitchen dining area lounge. Over looked the pool area.  Renovations and tree cutting was going on while I was there. Didn't bother me as they need to do it sometime and it's good they maintain.   I booked a taxi on findtransfer  website. Was expensive at €64 return. However the cars were elite and the drivers…

title: Friendly staff
review: Easy to find in a car to and from the airport (just look at map first).Staff at reception and at the restaurant in the evening and morning were very helpful and friendly.  We paid €4 for underground parking, although we might have been lucky getting parking for free in the open air.  Light in underground car park does go off quickly thought, luckily I was able to find the light switch, so take a small torch! Our room 804 did not have any of the horror stories.  We had a lovely meal in the Irons and Woods.  House red €18, food €60 (3 starters, 3 mains 1 dessert).  Room price €107.  Lovely size terrace to watch the sunset. Only two garden chairs though, we took one of the dining chairs out.  Two bedrooms one double with en suite shower and one twin room and family shower room. Of…

title: Golfholiday
review: Good for golfing, hotel acceptable, but missing a lot in the kitchen. In a apartment with 3 bedrooms only 2 chairs on the terrace. No waterboiler, most of the kitchen utensils missing or worn out. Breakfast in the restaurant good. Will probably not stay here again.

title: Golf resort with appartments ..... worn down
review: This golf resort is located not far away from Alicante airport. Appartments are ok, clean and good size. The resort itself is somewhat worn down. Pools seem old. Restaurant lacks atmosphere, somewhat like an old school cantina. Golf course is good.

title: Excellent in everyway..
review: Second time here and this time we spent a few days. Weather was perfect and still warm enough for the kids to swim. Bar and food was plentiful and value for money... but what makes it is the apartment.  3 Bedrooms, full aircon, kitchen, dining room, lounge, 40" tv... patio, sun roof, etc..etc.. all for under £100 per night...  The only complaint was that the wifi was flakey.. during the whole stay.. but was I there to be connected..??? NO..

title: Short break
review: Excellent facilities and scenic surroundings with well maintained golf course and pools Staff very efficient and helpful and restaurant popular with residents Location handy for Alicante and beaches and area is real Spain in character rather than tourist Costa Blanca

title: Lovely resort friendly staffs
review: Nice resort! Nice apartment, clean and spacious. Nice deco, tidy external facility. staffs are helpful and friendly. They provided so many service, there even a. Imputed to use in the hall. Only a little difficult to find.

title: Half hour walk to bus stop
review: If you don't want to drive, you can walk over a little hill by the resort (dirt road) and down a couple of roads to a bus stop. There are 2 buses that go to Alicante.  One of them comes from the airport so quite busy.   The walk is about 30 mins and the bus takes about 20 mins, but check the bus times in advance so you don't miss it. The tickets are around 2 euros for a single trip, or you can get a booklet of 10 tickets.  We couldn't find access to the beach on foot as there's a train track and dual carriageways in the way.  Excellent staff, some outstanding food (there's 2 menues). Lovely local Chardonay. Nice pool although the sun loungers are not adjustable. The resort would benefit from a shop onsite and a shuttle bus. The gym is 600 meters from the apartments and is very…

title: lovely place to stay
review: was lovely apartments and friendly staff. only downside is the food as a vegetarian I had some potatoes on the menu. the choice was cheap and limited for meat eaters too with an upgraded menu it would be a 5 star

title: 5* course with breath taking views!
review: I played here last week with friends and we couldn't rate it highly enough. It's €60 a round with a buggy or an all day pass for €71 also with a buggy. The ground staff are constantly working hard and the course is in pristine condition. If in the area it is a must play course. The only negative is with the buggys you can't drive on the fairways so you do still have to do a fair bit of walking but it's well worth it!

title: Lovely relaxing apartments
review: Staying in 3 bed apartment which was excellent and overlooking full length of pool. If just looking for R&R this the place and a game of golf if that is your wish. ISSUE: On turning off from main road visual directions are poor. It is signposted apartments not Hotel or Resort (initially assumed they were different places!!) It is apartment signpost you need to follow otherwise you end up at clubhouse....at opposite side of golf courses! Reception is 3rd opening along on RHS again poorly signposted for 1st time visitors. Access to Alicante or Elche and to & from airport is good. Pools are quiet and little problem of sunbed hugging ie towels left for hours. Have rebooked for 4 days next week and coming back with our family later on for week.

title: Fantastic place!
review: Beautiful spacious 3 bed apartment. Clean and serviced daily. It is away from Alicante old town with a taxi approx 15 euros. Lovely food at restaurant on site! Pool is lovely.  We hired a car which meant we could go to the massive supermarket

title: Poor Managment Made for a Frustrating and Short Stay
review: On our first night into the resort, we are unloading the vehicle and make our way into the staircase. Most other staircases in Madrid I had been had motion sensors to turn on the lights this one did not. While we are all tired and looking for the switch in of use its the first button we can find... turns out to be the fire alarm! there was no cover on the alarm it was just a button with red around it, which you can't see in the dark. Anyways, next morning the manager comes to the room and says we all have to leave within the hour because we are being kicked out because of our behavior the night prior. When we asked the management why they added to the story, that we had been peeing and puking out the windows. we asked for the evidence or the CC video footage and they had none.  …

title: Impressive!
review: Staying at this hotel while in Alicante. It has lovely surroundings, friendly staff and food tasted great. Apartments are lovely and spacious. A small bit of advice is the half board menu does not change so  ensure to book all inclusive for full menu. Also a car is needed as the hotel is in a secluded, but beautiful, place. Would recommend this lovely hotel for sure!

title: Rent a car! ;)
review: The resort is beautiful with great views and a stunning golf course. We visited during school terms so it was very quiet here. Very peaceful!  Both pools are beautiful and the surrounding grounds are well maintained. There is one main restaurant with a bar and outside dining by the main pool. I believe there is a club house also at the 19th.   We did however have a couple of issues. Fortunately we had hired a car at the airport so we're able to enjoy other parts of Alicante. However, the resort is remote and is a 15/20 min drive to Alicante centre which is the nearest civilisation.   If you want a golf holiday you will be more than entertained but note that apart from the pools, golf and gym, there is no entertainment within miles. Perfect for some but we both have itchy feet.  …

title: Great manager, lovely place to stay
review: We've Just returned home after a lovely week in El Plantio. We are a family of 5 tho the kids are adults 24 & 21 We had a 3 bedroom apartment which was spotless & ideal for us. I agree with other reviews you definitely need a car & a little shop selling milk & bread etc would make a killing tho you can access everywhere within a 10min drive i.e.:Alicante, supermarkets & shopping outlets.  My main reason for writing this review is to give a special mention to the manager & his staff who were great, we had an incident whilst there and the manager was fabulous in helping us, I really cannot thank him or speak highly enough of him he is a great asset to the hotel.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone & I'm definitely hoping to return myself.

title: Pleasant stay
review: I recently spent a short stay at El Plantio resort at short notice. We were looking for accommodation close to Alicante airport with facilities to entertain our friends who live 1.5 hours away after our plans needed to change. We had discussed our needs with the resort prior to travelling as one of our friends needed disabled facilities, when we arrived we had been allocated a ground floor apartment with full facilities. The apartment was superb with good kitchen facilities and lots of room, the patio was adjacent to the pool. The receptionist during our stay was Cecelia, this lady is a true asset to the firm she was friendly and nothing was too much trouble. We had a couple of minor issues during our stay which she dealt with immediately. On arrival we took a 10 min taxi ride…

title: Will def return
review: We had a really enjoyable stay at El Plantio in August 2017. The apartment (ground floor with a large patio) had everything we needed to stay with our two children. Two bathrooms, large bedrooms, well kitted out kitchen and utility room.  I requested a kettle before arrival which was delivered. The hotel is a short drive from Alicante so a car is a must, if only to go to the supermarket as there isn't as much as a shop on site. That said, we were more than aware of this and it actually worked in our favour as the hotel is quite quiet, no 'reserving sun beds' and over crowded pools. There are actually two pools - one with bar and restaurant where the food was lovely. The other was without bar/restaurant therefore quieter but clean and spacious. In the restaurant the food was…

title: El Plantio Golf Resort hidden gem
review: With a small child we where trying to avoid the "tower block" hotels (fearing a high balcony) then we stumbled across this hidden gem El Plantio Golf Resort. The pictures looked nice and having a third floor max was ideal. The staff where very friendly (reserved us a ground floor) apartment which was very clean, modern, spacious, air conditioned throughout and well equipped with kitchen and laundry room (washing machine and dryer). Cheerful cleaning ladies came every day. Overall we rate the accommodation 9/10.  Excellent size family pool with large child shallow area - would benefit from obvious colour change on "underwater" wall between shallow and deep parts. The pool is cleaned every night, but could do with another skim over at mid day as some leaves and insects later on. …

title: Pool
review: This used to be lovely. Now it's a bit tired as it hasn't changed decor wise in 4 years as far as I can see . Pool has the towel problem although signs everywhere!!  It is great to have a washing machine and tumble dryer  but it is along way out with not even a shop onsite to buy a paper! Definitely need a car.   I loved it last time as you didn't have to do the sun bed rush or go around huge inflatables in the pool. Will definitely. It return

title: Nice apartment but wifi is very poor and breakfast is average.
review: If you are looking for a place to relax next to a gold course with 2 large pools they this will tick the boxes.   I had a business meeting and was check the place out for future business golf trips.   I need wifi to communicate and the wifi here was very poor and complaining about it just got excuses and there was no real effort to explain apart from being told, "wifi is free so when you get it you do not have to pay for it".   Umm, not great when you need it and can not get it.   In the past month I have staying in a lot of hotels and the wifi here was the worst.   Sort this out and you are onto a winner.   However, I will not be risking a business return.   Again, I stress this is me with business head on so please ignore me if all you want to do is crash out and ignore the…

title: Extremely disappointed
review: We went to meet up with friends who were visiting from England. We stayed on a room only basis, they were on half board.  We had a lovely spacious apartment, the complex is attractive and the pools are a good size. The staff were all extremely friendly, especially the waitresses at dinner.   However the apartment smelt of damp, the floor was wet when we entered so I slipped and fell straight away. The shower came on in the night scaring the life out of me and there was blood on a tap. The dishes in the cupboard were dirty.  The pool area had no umbrellas for shade, the surrounding area is all gritty and it ends up in the pool.  The food was terribly expensive and the quality didn't reflect the prices at all.  It's not a cheap place, at £100 a night we expected much, much more.  …

title: El Plantino golf resort
review: Just back from this resort, stayed there with my wife and 3 children. We were greeted by a very pleasant lady who spoke very good English, we had a late flight and didn't arrive until 11.30 pm but there wasn't any hassle. Our huge 3 bed apartment was ground floor block 4 right next to the larger of the two pools.  Good points on this resort, the apartments are very big with kitchen 3 beds great A.C, staff are all great and happy to help, two large pools, enough sun loungers as people come and go through the day, breakfast was continental very good, evening menu was good bar snack or A'lacart, laid back chilled type of place, families and couples only really, wouldn't come on a group holiday if you expect a lively place. Room cleaned everyday great underground car parking if…

title: Highly recommended for an enjoyable stay
review: Staff are really helpful and respond very quickly to requests. Parking if spaces can be found is free, otherwise the more convenient covered garage is availabe for a small fee per night. It is a golf resort so it is just outside Alicante city, however the city centre is just a 10 miutes drive away. A car is must due to the location.  Unusual for this part of Spain is the free use of the room safe,  a bonus given that many other 4 star properties still charge to use a safe. The apartments offer great space and are very comfortable. The kitchen is well stocked with the basics such as pots, pans, dishes and even a dishwasher, if you wish to do some cooking but all other essentials such as washing up liquid you must bring yourself. Also washing machine and  dryer available in the…

title: Another great stay
review: After a wonderful visit last year my husband daughter and I stayed here again this year for 11 nights. We had requested the room that we had last year and were actually emailed back to say it could.not be guaranteed but they would do their best   Upon arriving we were unable to have the exact room we had last year however they placed us in a room in the same area and same layout we had like.   Fantastic breakfast selection with something for everyone. The orange juice was wonderful. Staff are very helpful. We had one small problem in our rooms and after reporting it to reception  it was fixed with half an hour.   Thanks so much for another memorable stay

title: Excellent.. Worth a try
review: Stop over on a road trip. Fantastic for the money. Kids loved it. Fantastic apartments and facilities. A+ and would definitely return.   Easy to find, just off the motorway. Go shopping first though. Limited in that it's really a golf course.

title: Ideal for a short stay close to the airport
review: Used El Plantio twice now. Both times due to late arriving flights and it's proximity to the airport.   The 3 bed apartment is excellent, spacious and clean. Free wifi and a good breakfast. Wouldn't want to stay here longer though as there doesn't seem to be anything else nearby.

title: Holiday review
review: Arrived earlier than 4pm check in time but we were checked in straight away the receptionists were very nice and welcoming.our apartment 612 was very nice and very good value for money .cleaned everyday and fresh towels .pools were  busy and clean only gripe difficult to get Sunbeds people put towels on them and think it's there's for the whole day this I believe is selfish and management should adress this. Apartments are looking a little tired and could do with a paint and refurb but overall it's a lovely quiet spot car is essential. Would recommend for couples ,families and anyone who wants peaceful break

title: Very rude staff
review: My self and 11 of my freinds stayed at the resort we was straight away met with unhelpfull staff and made to feel like we was unwelcome there. I understood that we was a large group who was trying to enjoy ourselves but we was made to feel very unwelcome   i never will go again and i strongly recommend if your a large group of guys dont go.

title: Excellent resort and staff
review: I recently stayed at resort during kids break with family. The resort , the rooms , staff food ,everything was nice. This was one of my best holidays I have ever been. It was close to airport and city. Only thing they could do is offer some kind of vouchers for returning guests . As we will be using again same place in future.

title: Excellant overnight stay
review: Very impressed with everything, amazing pools and couldnt believe there were two. Pity about the menu though, very bad choice and no childrens menu, we had to ask waitress if they had various meals suitable for the children and they werent one bit helpful. Waitresses didnt bring menus to us when we sat down and came to take our order, we had only arrived so asked to see menu, waitress seemed annoyed. Reception staff very helpful and we got our apartment very quickly. Would definitely return as fabulous place and so relaxing.

title: Return visitor
review: Have visited this resort several times before due to its location and away from the tourist trap.  Have not used the golfing facilities so cannot comment. Have gone self catering as its so much easier.Ideal base to explore surrounding area. Will need a car to get around.  Taxi to the city  costs between 15-20 euros one way.  Rooms clean, spacious and tidy. Stayed in block 7 and got the sun on the balconies, but limited view of the golf course or surrounding area.  Will be returning.

title: Good apartment and golf course but!
review: Stayed for 8 days to meet up with family. We booked bed and breakfast only, the others were on full board. The apartment was very spacious 2 bedrooms 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite) kitchen dining room etc. and could only be faulted by lack of kitchen utensils. No kettle, tea towel, washing up liquid etc. The balcony was large but unfortunately did not get any sun but if it did there was not enough furniture on it. So far so good, so would definitely recommend ! The gardens were well kept as was the Golf Course. Now we get onto the food and staff. The girls on reception fine. Breakfast staff fine. Breakfast acceptable if you like your bacon literaly swimming in fat so advise eat the cold food and fruit. Evening meal. Do not waste your money. The A la carte menu is very poor strange and…

title: Lovely mini getaway
review: Just a quick review for this one. We booked a few days before departure date. We went for this hotel as it was close to the airport. With it being only a few days away, it was important our transfer to hotel was a short one!  This hotel is set in beautiful gardens, the check in was smooth and were met with friendly staff. The apartment was spacious and modern.  We ventured out to Alicante in taxi for a bite to eat and get sense of the local atmosphere. Highly recommended by us!

title: Nice self catering apartments
review: Our family stayed in this resort for 3 nights at the end of our holiday in Spain. The apartment was clean, spacious and comfortable. The pool was great although a bit cold in April however our kids enjoyed it for a short splash around. It also had a little play park which they enjoyed. Although we didn't use the golf course or restaurant they both looked great to. We chose to go into Alicante for dinner. We had a car so this wasn't a problem. The nearest beaches were around 15mins away and lovely. We chose the resort because of the good family room rate and distance from airport as we had an early morning departure. Overall it was a good experience.

title: Excellent place to stay and very relaxing
review: El Plantio it takes a lot of beating if you want somewhere that is a really nice apartment with full kitchen and two bathrooms at a realistic price. Personally I don't play golf so that side has no appeal to me. The apartments are all very large but if you get one facing the golf course and you are on the top floor you have the advantage of a private patio and also an enormous roof terrace which is totally private - see photo. If you're not bothered about going out it's excellent place to hang out and relax.  The hotel has a bar and restaurant on-site but what it really needs is a poolside bar with a relaxing cabana / Beach side feel. I can't fault the place really but it just needs that little something to create a sort of relaxing hangout area and they certainly have the space…

title: Perfect location for golfers
review: Under 10 minutes from the Alicante airport you'll find El Plantio. A 20 euro taxi take you to the resort where white apartments meet you. Very friendly staff takes care of you in the reception there you also find a restaurant with a nice view over the pool area. The rooms are large, nicely designed with all you need to live here for a while.  From the balcony we had a prefect view over the golfcourse.   Down by the clubhouse you'll find a restaurant, gym, large drivingrange and a par 3 course.  The golfcourse are elevated, not much rough, small greens with many nice views over the landscape.  I recommend El Plantio for any golfers!

title: Still lovely
review: We stayed here before flying home from our holiday.  We've stayed before and loved it then and it's still great.  The apartments are amazing, large, comfortable, clean and smart. They don't have kettles.  Which is weird... boiling water in a pan for a morning coffee or tea.  But apart from that the rooms are great.  It's a way out of town so you definitely need a car here.  It has a bar and a restaurant.  Last time we were here we raved about the restaurant - it wasn't as good this time, but maybe I fell unlucky with the choice of lamb (not good) as my partner had cod, which looked (and was apparently) really good.  The facilities are amazing.  A great lengths pool and another pool, play parks for the children.  The pools are open when it's warm enough - so not now!! But are…

title: Happy Memories of a Short Break
review: Excellent accommodation in a three bedroom apartment. Very spacious and well furnished to a high standard .The staff were very helpful , patient and kind  The surroundings are lovely with mature trees .The food at the restaurant is of a very high standard for grown -ups .A  shared portion of spaghetti bolognaise was willingly provided for the youngsters. The breakfast buffet was comprehensive . I would say a car is essential . Airport very close and 15mins to Alicante (A79 ) I would definitely stay here again.

title: Don't go there with children
review: We just returned from El Plantio Golf Resort on the 18th Feb 2017. I went with my 8 year old daughter together with other friends/their kids. First of all, this resort was marketed by onthebeach as having a kids club, spa and other facilities for children. We found out this was not true. There was absolutely nothing to keep the children occupied. The pool was dirty and cold plus not heated so they couldn't even swim in it.  The closest shop is a taxi ride away and you don't pay less than 15-20 euros each way. The food was reasonable but it wasn't a buffet except breakfast and the same menu for the whole week. The apartments are well maintained and very clean. If you visit without children and not fussed about your meals then it is an ok resort. But DO NOT go there with kids as…

title: Pleasant stay
review: Had a lovely stay at the el plantio golf resort, although we didnt stay for the golf we had a lovely walk around the course, our 2 bed apartment was clean and well equipped, like other advisors you do need to buy essentials such as dishwasher tab, clothes ect and with no local shops if you don't have a car your stuck! We also used the resturant which served al a carte menu after 7.30pm but before that was the snack menu we ate there twice and enjoyed all we had, the food is presented to a very high standard and full of flavours and best of all not expensive for hotel. The staff are very helpful & friendly. My only advice is to have a hire car

title: DO NOT GO UNTIL BOILERS STOP CO INSIDE APARTMENT!
review: I am sorry to say this, but as a registered gas engineer – I was flabbergasted to find that all of the boilers in this resort are illegal and leak poisonous gas into every apartment-it would appear to be that the contractors they used did not follow the manufacturers instructions or EU regulations.    I have notified all the authorities and the director of the resort is aware of the problem. You must not stay here until the problem is resolved otherwise death or illness could be imminent.   On another note – I inspected the rest of the apartment, and when you look at all the fittings and finish – there has been no snagging and there are gaps, dust, wonkey  fixings and general lackadaisical workmanship.

title: Great golf at a great price
review: Dear Mrs. Seers,   As you can check. We do not answer the comments in this web, neither the positives nor the negatives. But in this affair, and following the instructions of the lawyer of the company, we understand that we must make an exception for the seriousness of your accusations. As we informed you by email, on Monday 13 February. Our hotels facilities comply with all regulations required by the law in Spain and were carried out by companies certified by the Ministry of Industry. We also sent you the Installation work document, of the apartment where you stayed, signed and stamped by an inspector, stating the following: “The distributor responsible for commissioning the installation certifies that the tests and checks indicated by the current regulations have been carried out, that the result of them is correct and that the installation is in service, so this document will constitute the certificate of pre-tests and commissioning of the installation.” The following Thursday of your stay and due to your calls, we received an inspection of Gas Natural Fenosa, the service provider. In this inspection the technician checked both the installation and the boiler of the apartment where you stayed, being correct in both cases. The inspector also took measurements of the filtered Co in the apartment with the boiler in use, the result of which is 0 parts per million. Therefore, the accusations made by you are false and may constitute a crime. We inform you that we reserve our right to initiate the relevant legal actions. Sincerely  Estimada Sra. Seers,  Tal y como podrá comprobar es norma de nuestro establecimiento no contestar a los comentarios de esta web, ni los positivos ni los negativos. Pero con su caso, y siguiendo las instrucciones del abogado de la empresa, entendemos que debemos hacer una excepción por la gravedad de sus acusaciones.  Como ya le informamos vía email, el pasado lunes 13 de febrero, las instalaciones de nuestro hotel cumplen con la normativa exigida en España y fueron efectuadas por empresas certificadas por el ministerio de Industria.  También se le envió el parte de instalación del apartamento donde se alojó, que viene firmado y sellado por un inspector, donde se indica lo siguiente: “El distribuidor responsable de la puesta en servicio de la instalación, certifica que han sido efectuadas las pruebas y comprobaciones indicadas por la reglamentación vigente, que el resultado de las mismas es correcto y que la instalación queda en disposición de servicio, por lo que este documento pasa a constituir el certificado de pruebas previas y puesta en servicio de la instalación”.  El jueves siguiente a su estancia con nosotros y debido a sus llamadas, recibimos una inspección de Gas Natural Fenosa, proveedor del servicio. En esta inspección el técnico comprobó tanto la instalación como el calentador del apartamento donde se alojó, siendo correcto en ambos casos. Dicho inspector también tomó medidas del Co filtrado dentro del apartamento estando el calentador en funcionamiento, siendo el resultado del mismo de 0 partes por millón.  Por tanto, las acusaciones que nos hace son falsas y pueden ser constitutivas de delito. Le informamos que nos reservamos el derecho a iniciar las acciones legales pertinentes.  Atentamente

title: Large apartment in remote location
review: We visited El Plantio as 2 couples, we flew Jet2 from on Leeds Bradford, then stayed 3 nights. The apartment  we booked had 3 double bedrooms it was clean, roomy, modern and well equipped. We had a bath room and the master had an ensuite. Good kitchen with enough cooking equipment for simple snacks, we didn't have a dish cloth washing up liquid , dish washer tabs or oven gloves which would have been very handy ! The resort is close to the airport but  a car is needed to get around as the resort has no shops for the essential food/ drink  items. The apartment has 2 TVs, fridge freezer, washer and dryer and lots of storage space . Our apartment faced the golf course which was lovely.  Great breakfast was included in our package. We had booked golf lessons with Andreas who was very…

title: Lovely Apartment
review: I stayed in winter so prices were very cheap. On my own but had a three bed apartment. Very spacious for a family, fully equipped kitchen. The A/C system was very good - I had to use it for heating (!) but it worked a treat. It's a remote site so not much for kids to explore but has two good pools. About 10 minutes drive to Alicante marina and 5 mins to the nearest large Carrefour. Close to Elche as well which is well worth a visit.

title: My birthday
review: El plantio apartments were excellent in terms of space and very modern. The location requires a car. The food was very nice and restaurant staff very pleasant,particularly a nice waitress Maria. Our trip was out of season so the place was obviously very quiet.We enjoyed out time at el plantio. The apartment had a large rooftop terrace which would be excellent in warmer weather.

title: BIG DISAPPOINTMENT
review: Although we can't fault this place (the quality is there and a very nice golf course nearby is a bonus) we were very upset while checking in because the receptionist refused to honor our voucher from the leading golf tour operator in England which clearly said that we had paid for our stay IN FULL!!! On the other hand we should consider ourselves lucky because our new payment with credit card was approved otherwise we would end up somewhere on the streets of Alicante!!! The worst part was that receptionist couldn't care less and kept on asking for a new payment in order to get a room (meaning that our voucher was good for nothing)!!! So dear guests, be warned and expect unexpected while choosing this hotel!!!

title: Perfect holiday place
review: Love this place and have been there twice already .This hotel/ appartment complex has large spacious quiet appartments 2- 3 bedrooms. It has two pool areas with sun lounges. A very good breakfast buffet and snack and evening resaturant. Thre really usnt much around here except the golf course but Alicante and environs just 10- 15  min away by car. The apartments are very quiet and some have views of the el plantio golf course or the landscape around. Staff are very friendly and helpful as well.

title: relaxing resort
review: This is a excellent resort if you want peace and tranquility,it will cost you about 15 euro to get a taxi into the centre of Alicante.We stayed in the self catering apartment which was very good,all you needed to make your stay very comfortable.It was overlooking the golf course which also was very good but the cost to play rent golf clubs which were of a poor quality,then to have to buy golf balls and tees left the course to expensive to play.It was worth the 45 euro green fee but it stops their.The restaurant food was excellent and well presented and the catering staff were helpful and friendly.The only problem I had with the resort was the fact they took advantage of the lowcost holidays situation,they  put the room up by 150 euro extra,they explained all this before we…

title: Good Accommodation Close to Alicante Airport
review: A quiet well maintained resort with good facilities including two good swimming pools. Did not have a chance to try the golf course but looked in good condition. A particular benefit was the proximity to the airport about 10 minutes away.

title: Fabulous start to our holiday
review: We stayed here for two nights at the start of our holiday. We arrived at 9 pm, checked in quickly and were ordering dinner soon afterwards. It arrived in no time at all which was a pleasant surprise. The wating staff were great, especially Maria who gave us a big smile and made us feel very welcome. The pool was just the right temperature. We ordered a car through the hotel which saved us a lot of money on what they were charging at the airport. Would definitely go back. It was very relaxing being there. You do need a car though.

title: Great Value and Excellent Accommodation
review: We stayed at El Plantio Golf Resort and had an excellent experience. The rooms are actually apartments, not traditional hotel rooms. Ours was a large 3-bedroom with a full kitchen and lovely terrace that overlooked the swimming pool. We found the front desk staff to always be helpful and friendly, as well as the restaurant staff. The food at the restaurant was excellent, and a good value too. Most importantly, I left my laptop computer in the hotel and did not realize that I had left it until 5 hours later when we arrived home. I called the resort and they said that they had recovered the computer and quickly posted it to me, extremely well-packaged (thanks Victoria!). We look forward to coming back next year, and would not hesitate for a moment to recommend this resort.

title: Good apartment but a pity about the pool
review: We loved the apartment it was functional, clean and luxurious with a walk in shower in the master on suite. There were two swimming pools and they were the reason why we stayed there. We had to tell reception several times that the pools needed cleaning, they were eventually clean but they should have realised themselves. It is a pity as otherwise we would have returned.

title: Good resort, big apartments
review: Stayed last week in September. Apartments are big with 3 bedrooms, two baths, kitchen with oven, microwave,  fridge and freezer. Washer and dryer also in the apartment.  Very friendly staff. Drawbacks: No shop where you can buy stuff to the apartment like washing powder, drinks and other basic stuff. Pool are a little worn and sunbeds are damaged. No discount on golf fee even if you stay at the resort.

title: Dirty :(
review: Stayed here last year & had a wonderfully clean apartment. Sadly this year had the complete opposite. Place was filthy like it had been locked up & left for 6 months full of cobwebs & dust.  Such a shame as the concept of El Plantio is super. I would suggest the cleaners need a few cleaning lessons!

title: Another fabulous stay
review: My second time staying here.  Once again the staff were very welcoming, polite and friendly.  The resort is only 10 mins from the airport but you get very little noise from planes.  Also about 15 mins from "downtown" Alicante.  We hired a car and used the underground car park which is definitely worth it.  My only (slight) gripe is the fact that the lampshades in the bedroom that were dirty last year, were still dirty this year!  Otherwise, the apartment was very clean.  I think the walls could probably do with a lick of paint too.

title: Golf visit
review: El plantio apartments are large and functional but could do with a bit of sprucing up.  We stayed in 315 which was lovely and quiet but the balcony was sheltered from the sun and was stuck in the corner slightly so view was limited.  All rooms are supposedly overlooking the golf course but this one does not which was disappointing but it was so hot there weren't many golfers.  The restaurant is limiting in choice of food and could do with. Being expanded.  The hotel is a bit out of the way and it costs about 15€ each way to get into Alicante.  Would go there again

title: A lovely place - gold at the rainbow's end
